sql.query:
SELECT user_id
FROM t_user_log
WHERE login_token = :P1 /* {{$_POST.logintoken}} */ AND login_from = :P2 /* {{'Android'}} */
ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT fname, lname, mobile, is_watsapp, watsapp_no, address, pin, ps, district, state, country, wallet_bal
FROM m_customer
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{GetVerify.user_id}} */ AND status = :P2 /* {{1}} */ AND user_type_id = :P3 /* {{6}} */

SELECT id, prod_id, price_id, user_id, prod_unit_price, prod_qty, total_price, cart_mrp
FROM r_cart
WHERE user_id = :P1 /* {{GetVerify.user_id}} */

UPDATE m_customer
SET wallet_bal = :P1 /* {{WalletNetAmt}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{GetVerify.user_id}} */

INSERT INTO r_order
(order_id, user_id, total_amt, discount, delevery_amt, user_name, address, mobile, whatsapp, pin, ps, dist, state, country, wallet_bal, created_by, created_on, status) VALUES (:P1 /* {{OrderId}} */, :P2 /* {{GetVerify.user_id}} */, :P3 /* {{$_POST.all_total_amt}} */, :P4 /* {{$_POST.PromoCodeAmt}} */, :P5 /* {{$_POST.shipping_charge}} */, :P6 /* {{GetUserDetails.fname+' '+GetUserDetails.lname}} */, :P7 /* {{GetUserDetails.address}} */, :P8 /* {{GetUserDetails.mobile}} */, :P9 /* {{GetUserDetails.watsapp_no}} */, :P10 /* {{GetUserDetails.pin}} */, :P11 /* {{GetUserDetails.ps}} */, :P12 /* {{GetUserDetails.district}} */, :P13 /* {{GetUserDetails.state}} */, :P14 /* {{GetUserDetails.country}} */, :P15 /* {{$_POST.wallet_amt}} */, :P16 /* {{GetVerify.user_id}} */, :P17 /* {{NOW}} */, :P18 /* {{1}} */)

INSERT INTO r_order_details
(order_table_id, prod_id, price_id, cart_id, user_id, prod_qty, each_unit_price, each_net_amt, order_status, created_by, created_on) VALUES (:P1 /* {{AddOrder.identity}} */, :P2 /* {{GetCartItems[$index].prod_id}} */, :P3 /* {{GetCartItems[$index].price_id}} */, :P4 /* {{GetCartItems[$index].id}} */, :P5 /* {{GetVerify.user_id}} */, :P6 /* {{GetCartItems[$index].prod_qty}} */, :P7 /* {{GetCartItems[$index].prod_unit_price}} */, :P8 /* {{GetCartItems[$index].total_price}} */, :P9 /* {{1}} */, :P10 /* {{GetVerify.user_id}} */, :P11 /* {{NOW}} */)
